hadala thiyenawa...moya hariye punchi pak ekakuth thiyenawa....migamuwe lellama thiyenne disa adhikaranaya langa werale.....aluth eka thiyenne pitipana pare..mankuliye.......ude pandarata balanna oona lellame sellam....aluth ekata enne loku malu...trolar walin ena eewa....halawathin gena ewath thiyenawa....denne loku pramana walin....ethana podi malu nam ayis dapuwa....ude weddi maha lellame wada iwarayi ...ithuru malu tikath parana ekata enawa..parana lellamata ude enne podi malu...salayo,hurullo,isso,podi balayo,podi kelawallo wage ewun....podi lellame malu warga gananawak wikunanna thiyenawa....pandarama giya nam podi bottu saha oru walin gena aluth malu ganna puluwan...eeth 12-1 wenakam malu thiyenawa...methanath malu gana danne nathiwa giyoth illana ewun neme hamba wenne....kelawallo kiyala bala malu aran aapu mahaththuru hemath innawa...math migamu wada karana kale lellamen thamayi malu gaththe....
